basics.description: **Welcome to Bellhop** From the basement to the penthouse, Bellhop will make sure your Azure infrastructure always ends up on the right floor! The Deployment Prefix below will be used to create the following resources during the deployment: | Resource | Resource Name | | --- | --- | | Resource Group | <prefix>-rg | | Storage Account | <prefix>stgacct | | App Service Plan | <prefix>-asp | | Application Insights | <prefix>-appinsights | | App Configuration | <prefix>-appconfig | | Function App (Engine) | <prefix>-function-engine | | Function App (Scaler) | <prefix>-function-scaler | The following permissions will be assigned to the Function App Managed Identities during the deployment: | Managed Identity | Permission | Scope | | --- | --- | --- | | Function App (Engine) | Reader | <Subscription> | | Function App (Engine) | App Configuration Data Reader | <App Configuration> | | Function App (Engine) | Queue Data Message Sender | <Storage Account> | | Function App (Scaler) | Contributor | <Subscription> |

validations.message: Must have correct permission to complete this step.

basics.name: appName
basics.label: Deployment Prefix
basics.toolTip: The prefix for the Bellhop deployment components.

constraints.validationMessage: The Deployment Prefix must be between 3 and 17 characters long and contain letters and numbers only.

basics.name: engineInterval
basics.label: Bellhop Schedule
basics.toolTip: The interval at which the Bellhop engine should execute.

elements.name: tagPrefix
elements.label: Tag Prefix (optional)
elements.toolTip: Prefix which will Bellhop will expect to be prepended to all tags.

validations.message: Only alphanumeric characters, undercores, and dashes are allowed. The value must be 1-30 characters long.

elements.name: setStateTag
elements.label: Target State Prefix
elements.toolTip: Prefix which will be prepended to resource parameter tags which Bellhop uses to identify the target state of the target resource when scaled down.

validations.message: Only alphanumeric characters, undercores, and dashes are allowed. The value must be 1-30 characters long.

elements.name: saveStateTag
elements.label: Saved State Prefix
elements.toolTip: Prefix which will be prepended to resource parameter tags which Bellhop uses to remember the original state of the target resource when scaled down.

validations.message: Only alphanumeric characters, undercores, and dashes are allowed. The value must be 1-30 characters long.
